name: Circle Packing 0
description: Big cirles, less big circles and not big circles. Tutorial: https://generativeartistry.com/tutorials/circle-packing/.

name: Sine Wave
description: A wave made of multiple hexagons. Inspried by Colorful Coding on Youtube. Sine wave structures. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vmhRlDyPHMQ.
